alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 4:52PM CDT until April 26 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MCLENNAN AND SOUTHEASTERN BOSQUE COUNTIES... At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Valley Mills, or 10 miles southeast of Clifton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... China Spring around 510 PM CDT. Golson around 520 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Rock Creek and Gholson. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
